draw_prompt: A sly fox with a mischievous grin tiptoeing past a chicken coop at twilight, holding a stolen egg behind its back. Dark muted tones with soft shadows, comic-style exaggerated facial expressions, faint moonlight reflecting in its half-closed eyes.
